name: Tech Rider
description:
An infinite driver where the screen rotates randomly every 10 seconds. You must keep driving into the sunset. If you overheat you’ll have to get a new car and continue driving into the future. Jump, drive, fly, and dodge. The goal is to stay alive as long as possible and get the highest score.

Programming: @cavedens

Art/Animation: @perfectfitz

Music credit goes to: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Controls:

Move Left: A

Move Right: D

Strafe Left: Q

Strafe Right: E

Jump: Space

Shoot: LMB

Made by Creatorship Games -David and Clint Fitzgerald- (https://itch.io/profile/creatorshipgames)
